redirects: List of items needed for emote clues
List of items needed for clue scrolls

properties.name: description
properties.value: The following is a list of all the items, organised by level, that are needed for Emote clues. The items in a list are alphabetically organised. For items that require multiple items, the quantity is given, so that you know exactly how many items you are going to need for each clue type; this is useful for stocking up items when making STASH units. When no quantity is given to an item it means it only needs one item for that clue level by default. Note that one item in the list of one level of a clue, can also appear in the list of another level of a clue. Don't forget this when stocking up on items!

content:
The following is a list of all the items, organised by level, that are needed for Emote clues. The items in a list are alphabetically organised. For items that require multiple items, the quantity is given, so that you know exactly how many items you are going to need for each clue type; this is useful for stocking up items when making STASH units. When no quantity is given to an item it means it only needs one item for that clue level by default. Note that one item in the list of one level of a clue, can also appear in the list of another level of a clue. Don't forget this when stocking up on items!

Contents

  • 1 Items by clue level
    • 1.1 Beginner clues
    • 1.2 Easy clues
    • 1.3 Medium clues
    • 1.4 Hard clues
    • 1.5 Elite clues
    • 1.6 Master clues
  • 2 References

Items by clue level[edit | edit source]

Beginner clues[edit | edit source]

Items required
Bronze axe Chef's hat Gold necklace
Gold ring Leather boots Red cape

Minimum level requirements
20 Attack 20 Ranged 20 Defence
Items required
Air tiara Black axe Black cape Black platebody
2 × Blue robe top Blue wizard hat Blue wizard robe Body tiara
Bronze 2h sword Bronze axe Bronze chainbody Bronze dagger
Bronze full helm 2 × Bronze platelegs Bronze spear 4 × Coif
Cream robe top 2 × Desert shirt Emerald amulet 2 × Emerald ring
Gold necklace 2 × Gold ring Green boots Green hat
Green robe bottoms Green robe top Ham boots 2 × Ham robe
Hardleather body 2 × Iron chainbody Iron full helm 2 × Iron kiteshield
Iron med helm 2 × Iron platebody Iron platelegs Iron plateskirt
Iron scimitar Iron warhammer Leather boots 4 × Leather chaps
Leather cowl 3 × Leather gloves Longbow Mithril pickaxe
Oak longbow Oak shortbow Pink robe top Pink skirt
Ruby ring Sapphire amulet Sapphire necklace Sapphire ring
Staff of water Staff Steel axe Steel full helm
Steel longsword Steel mace Steel med helm Steel pickaxe
Steel platebody Steel plateskirt Studded body 2 × Studded chaps
Tiara Turquoise robe bottoms 2 × White apron

Diamond ring Green d'hide body 5 × Green d'hide chaps Green hat
Green robe top Hardleather body Iron 2h sword Iron med helm
Iron pickaxe Leather boots Leather gloves 2 × Maple longbow
Maple shortbow Mithril chainbody Mithril full helm Mithril med helm
Mithril boots Mithril platebody Mithril platelegs Mithril plateskirt

Sapphire amulet Silver sickle Snakeskin boots Snakeskin chaps
2 × Staff of air 2 × Steel kiteshield Steel longsword Steel platebody

Total items: 57

40 Defence 60 Prayer
Items required

Elemental shield Fire battlestaff Any colour headband Any rune heraldic helm
2 × Any rune heraldic kiteshield Iron platebody Mithril platelegs Mystic fire staff
Mystic hat Mystic robe top 2 × Ring of life Rune axe
Rune boots Rune full helm Rune halberd Rune pickaxe
2 × Rune platebody 2 × Rune platelegs Rune spear Rune warhammer
Any god Stole

Elite clues[edit | edit source]

Minimum level requirements
70 Attack 50 Strength 70 Ranged 70 Magic
60 Defence 60 Prayer
Items required
2 × Amulet of glory Barrows gloves Black d'hide chaps Black d'hide vambraces
Black salamander Blue d'hide vambraces Bob shirt Cape of legends
Castle wars bracelet Climbing boots Combat bracelet Dragon battleaxe
Dragon boots Dragon med helm Dragon necklace 2 × Dragon spear
Dragonstone amulet Dragonstone ring Any full god book Granite shield
Helm of neitiznot Any rune heraldic helm Lava battlestaff Magic longbow
Mind shield Any god mitre Mystic robe bottom Pirate bandana
Proselyte hauberk Red d'hide chaps Ring of forging Rolling pin
Rune boots Rune crossbow Rune kiteshield Rune longsword
Rune plateskirt Seercull Splitbark body Splitbark legs
Spotted cape Pyromancer robe Farmer's strawhat Shayzien body (5)

Master clues[edit | edit source]

Minimum level requirements
75 Attack 70 Ranged 70 Defence 50 Agility
Items required
Abyssal whip Amulet of glory Amulet of the damned Arclight
Bandos boots Bandos cloak Bandos godsword Bandos platebody
Any set of barrows equipment 2 × Black d'hide body Black d'hide chaps 2 × Black d'hide vambraces
Black dragon mask Any colour Boater Brine sabre Bryophyta's staff
Bull roarer 2 × Cape of legends Climbing boots A newly imbued Crystal bow
Death tiara Dragon 2h sword Dragon axe[n 1] Dragon battleaxe
Dragon chainbody Dragon defender Dragon med helm Dragon pickaxe[n 2]
Dragon plateskirt Dragon sq shield Fire cape Flared trousers
Helm of neitiznot Iban's staff Menaphite purple hat Menaphite purple robe
Menaphite purple top Mystic robe bottom (dark) Mystic robe top (dark) Nature tiara
Obsidian cape Pharaoh's sceptre Ring of wealth Rune boots
Rune platebody Shadow sword Slayer helmet Spined chaps
Splitbark body Toktz-ket-xil Toktz-xil-ul Zamorak full helm
Zamorak godsword
  1. ^ Variants such as the infernal axe and crystal axe can be used and stored for the emote clue at the Enchanted Valley.[1]
  2. ^ Variants such as the infernal pickaxe, dragon pickaxe (upgraded), and dragon pickaxe (or) can be used and stored for the emote clue at the Soul Altar.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. "Poll 71 and Darkmeyer Updates". 18 June 2020. (Archived from the original.) Old School RuneScape News.
